title: Session Data Table Implementation
summary: Introduces a new database table for efficient storage and retrieval of session data, indexed by user ID and session timestamp.

title: Enhance Middleware Documentation for Custom Integrations
summary: Revise and expand the middleware documentation to provide clear guidance on creating custom integrations with Django applications, including examples and troubleshooting tips.

title: Session Data API Enhancement
summary: Introduces an API to manage session data, facilitating CRUD operations for session management in web applications.

title: Expired Session Purge Task
summary: Adds a scheduled task to delete expired sessions from the database to enhance storage efficiency.

title: Session Hijacking via Cookie Manipulation
summary: A vulnerability in session management allows attackers to hijack user sessions by altering cookies, leading to unauthorized access.
